about.name: hassan  a. adeola
content: I'm a professional Full Stack Web Developer with expertise in designing and developing websites. I specialise in creating beautiful, functional professional websites that are semantic and SEO-friendly by adopting best practices and the most recent W3C web standards.

Great design, in my opinion, is in the details, and design must also support functionality. I have the skills and knowledge essential to make your project a success, having worked as a professional web developer for over 7 years. From discussion and collaboration to project completion, I appreciate every step of the design process.

I consider myself a 'lifelong learner' who is always willing to acquire new skills and expand my professional horizons. I can also apply my previous abilities and knowledge to solve difficult situations. My thirst for knowledge and commitment to putting knowledge into practice has aided my recent success at the School of Disciples, where I am the Head of the Information and Communication Technology Department.

projects.name: MIC Earn Business
projects.type: full stack website with both frontend and backend

projects.name: BAH Engineering Consultant
projects.type: Multi pages front end web application

services.name: custom web applications
content: Client-specific web applications are built and developed particularly to satisfy their needs.
Custom web projects are tailored exactly the way the client wants them to be, whether it's an aesthetically beautiful front-end only project or a full-stack project.
I can create a singl- page website, a multi-page web application, an e-commerce website, or a blog utilizing the best web design approaches to meet or exceed the client's expectations.

services.name: content management system
content: The Content Management System (CMS) gives the customer control over the website's content, allowing you to manage the content that is visible to website visitors.
I can use WordPress to create a top-notch CMS for a conventional website, a blog, or an online store.

services.name: ecommerce website
content: Transferring a physical store to the digital sphere necessitates adopting the most effective approach and technology to retain existing consumers while also attracting new ones.
To create a top-notch e-commerce website with or without an integrated Payment Processor, I use Woocommerce, which is powered by WordPress.

services.name: SEO optimisation
content: All websites' visibility and reach are determined by search engines. A website's poor visibility can be disastrous to a business or organization if it is not properly optimized.

For example, in order to increase sales, an e-commerce platform must reach a larger audience. I can help your website reach a wider audience by ensuring that it is ranked higher on prominent search engines such as Google, Bing, and Yandex using Meta tags, Title tags, content, page speed, website backlinks, and much more.

services.name: web support and maintenance
content: Being a website developer entails more than just creating a visually appealing website and a functional back-end API or Content Management System (CMS).
Maintenance and support are a part of the job, which ensures that client websites are error-free, always up, and unaffected by cyberattacks of any kind.

Choosing a hosting plan that is adequate to maintain the client's website active, fast, and operating while staying within the client's budget is one approach to improving the client's web experience.

services.name: UI/UX
content: Every website is created in response to the way people interact with the platform, the way they seek information or their impression. UX refers to producing applications that focus on usability whereas UI refers to developing applications that focus on visuals.

My role as a UX designer is to interact with your website's end users so that I can evaluate and understand them by asking whom they are, analyzing their habits, and focusing on their needs via interviews, surveys, and research.
As a UI designer, my job entails translating the results of end-user behaviour study into a visually appealing website that is simple to navigate and interact with.

services.name: full stack web development
content: For projects that require end-to-end or full-cycle management, the full-stack development technique is frequently utilized. This method entails creating a front-end application and a back-end application that communicates with one another.

I can create a beautiful front-end application using HTML, CSS/SASS, and Javascript frameworks like ReactJS or jQuery. I can also develop backend APIs with NodeJS and Express, as well as a REST API with PHP.
With these tools, I had been able to develop several services that relied on authentication and a database such as MySQL or MongoDB.
